categories: Category:Jedi trainees of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: Ba'Ols was a male Tarasin Jedi Padawan who served the Jedi Order and the Galactic Republic during the waning years of the Republic Classic era.

A Force-sensitive Tarasin, Ba'Ols trained in the ways of the Force at the Almas Academy, one of the Jedi Order's more experimental academies. Stationed on Almas in 32 BBY, Padawan Ba'Ols was dispatched to the moon Uffel to defend a droid production facility when LN-73 and his band of saboteurs attempted to seize it.
